attributes.action: Alun Wyn Jones should receive a Knighthood in the Queen's Birthday Honours.
attributes.additional_details: He has been foremost in the resurgence of Welsh Rugby in the last ten years and proudly holds the record of most Welsh and British and Irish Lions caps.
attributes.background: A leader by example, he epitomises the character of Wales and the Welsh people - immensely proud of his heritage yet humble as to his achievements. He leads from the front, encourages his teammates and carries the respect of his adversaries.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
